main event: A civilian witness observed a blue-white light in the sky that appeared and disappeared behind power lines over the course of 7 minutes.
interesting points: The light abruptly appeared and disappeared, consistent with the appearance and disappearance of a satellite.
The witness's son was outside observing Christmas decorations when he called the witness to observe the object.
The object moved northward and disappeared behind a hill.
The weather conditions at the time were clear and dark.
There was a strong inversion at 4,000 feet in the area.
sighted object: A blue-white light in the sky
